definition: branch/stem/stalk/CL:根[gen1]/to block/to hinder/(Tw) interesting, fresh, or amusing subject matter or scenario
Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with

sentences.english: CR was found more frequently in Patients with extensive anterior wall MI.
sentences.chinese: 在广泛前壁心肌梗塞患者易发生心脏破裂。

sentences.english: A simple blood test may predict future heart disease. A number of risk factors can predict your chance of getting a heart attack.
sentences.chinese: 根据一些风险因素，能够预测出你患心肌梗塞的机率。

sentences.english: Early diagnosis and treatment of acute right ventricular myocardial infarction.
sentences.chinese: 右心室心肌梗塞的早期诊断和治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the difference of risk factors between angina cordis and myocardial infarct.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨心绞痛与心肌梗塞相关危险因素的差异。

sentences.english: The infarct size was measured by the triphenyl tetrazolium chloride method.
sentences.chinese: 心肌梗塞面积通过三苯基四唑氯化物染色法测定。

sentences.english: Mr. Zhao is a 60-year-old man with hereditary myocardial infarction.
sentences.chinese: 赵老先生是一位60岁有家族心肌梗塞历史的老人。

sentences.english: The obituary didn't say that, of course.
sentences.chinese: 当然，讣告上没有这样写，而是说他死于心肌梗塞。

sentences.english: I think you have an acute myocardial infarction.
sentences.chinese: 我想您得的是急性心肌梗塞。

sentences.english: Maybe severe dementia makes people more vulnerable to microinfarcts.
sentences.chinese: 也许重度痴呆更易导致微型心肌梗塞。

sentences.english: For example the oxgen need of a patient with myocardial infarction must always be met at once.
sentences.chinese: 例如心肌梗塞病人的氧气需要总是必须立即满足的。

sentences.english: Old Ginger is good for people's healthy that it can prevent thrombus and myocardial infarction.
sentences.chinese: 老姜有着预防血栓和心肌梗塞的作用。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate non Q wave myocardial infarction(NQWMI) with or without left ventricular remodeling(LVR).
sentences.chinese: 目的了解无Q波型心肌梗塞病人有无左心室重塑。

sentences.english: To evaluate the application of MRI in myocardial infarction.
sentences.chinese: 探讨MRI在心肌梗塞方面的应用价值。

definition: abbr. for 心肌梗塞[xin1 ji1 geng3 sai1], myocardial infarction/heart attack
